10H.F.summary: Scandic Hotels Group AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, operates and franchises hotels in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark, Germany, Poland, and other European Countries. The company operates hotels under the Scandic, Hilton, Holiday Inn, Crown Plaza, and Indigo brands. As of September 9, 2020, it operated approximately 280 hotels. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

PNDX-B.ST.summary: Pandox AB (publ) develops, owns, manages, operates, and leases hotel properties. The company operates through Property Management and Operator Activities segments. As of April 03, 2020, it had 156 hotels with approximately 35,000 hotel rooms in 15 countries. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.
